info.title: Text-to-Speech
info.description: The Voice RSS Text-to-Speech (TTS) API allows conversion of textual content to speech easier than ever. Just connect to our Text-to-Speech (TTS) API with a few lines of code and get verbal representation of a textual content.

get.description: Converts textual content to audio content

parameters.name: r
parameters.description: The speech rate (speed). Allows values: from -10 (slowest speed) up to 10 (fastest speed). Default value: 0 (normal speed)

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: The textual content for converting to speech

post.description: Converts textual content to audio content

info.title: Text-to-speech
info.description: This API instantly generates high quality speech from text. Simply send a request with the text you want read, and we'll instantly return a wav, mp3, or ogg with it been spoken!

get.description: Converts text into high quality speech.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: wav, mp3, and ogg file formats are supported

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: See /v1/tts/languages to query the available languages

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Whatever text you want to be converted into audio

parameters.name: voice
parameters.description: See /v1/tts/voices for details on how to query the installed voices

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Returns the names of voices that are available for the given language
